info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 4:55PM CDT until June 01 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Reeves County in southwestern Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Toyah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Toyah. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 12 and 25. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
